005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026/**
027 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
028 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>
029 * function.
030 */
031public final class ArraySubarray {
032  private static final String NAME = "subarray";
033  @NonNull
034  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
035      .name(NAME)
036      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
037      .deterministic()
038      .contextIndependent()
039      .focusIndependent()
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("array")
042          .type(IArrayItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .argument(IArgument.builder()
046          .name("start")
047          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
048          .one()
049          .build())
050      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
051      .returnOne()
052      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeTwoArg)
053      .build();
054  @NonNull
055  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
056      .name(NAME)
057      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
058      .deterministic()
059      .contextIndependent()
060      .focusIndependent()
061      .argument(IArgument.builder()
062          .name("array")
063          .type(IArrayItem.class)
064          .one()
065          .build())
066      .argument(IArgument.builder()
067          .name("start")
068          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
069          .one()
070          .build())
071      .argument(IArgument.builder()
072          .name("length")
073          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
074          .one()
075          .build())
076      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
077      .returnOne()
078      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeThreeArg)
079      .build();
080
081  private ArraySubarray() {
082    // disable construction
083  }
084
085  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
086  @NonNull
087  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeTwoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
088      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
089      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
090      IItem focus) {
091    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
092        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
093    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
094
095    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start));
096  }
097
098  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
099  @NonNull
100  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeThreeArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
101      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
102      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
103      IItem focus) {
104    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
105        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
106    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
107    IIntegerItem length = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
108
109    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start, length));
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
114   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
115   *
116   * @param <T>
117   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
118   * @param array
119   *          the target Metapath array
120   * @param startItem
121   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
122   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
123   * @throws ArrayException
124   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
125   */
126  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
127  @NonNull
128  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
129      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
130      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem) {
131    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
136   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
137   *
138   * @param <T>
139   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
140   * @param array
141   *          the target Metapath array
142   * @param startItem
143   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
144   * @param lengthItem
145   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
146   *          start position
147   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
148   * @throws ArrayException
149   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
150   *           to array:size
151   */
152  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
153  @NonNull
154  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
155      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
156      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem,
157      @NonNull IIntegerItem lengthItem) {
158    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), lengthItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
163   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
164   *
165   * @param <T>
166   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
167   * @param array
168   *          the target Metapath array
169   * @param start
170   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
171   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
172   * @throws ArrayException
173   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
174   *           to array:size
175   */
176  @NonNull
177  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
178      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
179      int start) {
180    return subarray(array, start, array.size() - start + 1);
181  }
182
183  /**
184   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
185   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
186   *
187   * @param <T>
188   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
189   * @param array
190   *          the target Metapath array
191   * @param start
192   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
193   * @param length
194   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
195   *          start position
196   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
197   * @throws ArrayException
198   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
199   *           to array:size
200   */
201  @NonNull
202  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
203      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
204      int start,
205      int length) {
206    if (length < 0) {
207      throw new ArrayException(
208          ArrayException.NEGATIVE_ARRAY_LENGTH, String.format("The length '%d' is negative.", length));
209    }
210
211    List<T> copy;
212    try {
213      copy = array.subList(start - 1, start - 1 + length);
214    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
215      throw new ArrayException(
216          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
217          String.format("The start + length (%d + %d) exceeds the array length '%d'.",
218              start,
219              length,
220              array.size()),
221          ex);
222    }
223
224    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(new ArrayList<>(copy));
225  }
226}
